Feature: Ecological/Bioregional Layer Value Recognition for Student
  As a student studying environmental science and developing ecological awareness
  Operating at the ecological/bioregional governance layer
  I want to connect personal choices to planetary care and understand ecological stewardship
  So that I develop integrated care economy practice from individual to planetary scale

  Background:
    Given the Elohim Protocol is operational
    And the student user "Kenji" is registered in the system
    And Kenji is studying environmental science
    And Kenji has academic knowledge of ecological systems
    And Kenji makes daily consumption choices with limited budget
    And the ecological/bioregional governance context is active
    And the bioregional_elohim could connect personal actions to ecological impact
    And Kenji wants his life aligned with environmental values

  Scenario: Connecting grocery shopping to ecological care economy
    Given Kenji shops for food on $50/week budget
    And food choices have ecological impact
    When the bioregional_elohim helps Kenji make food decisions
    Then it should show ecological impact of different food choices
    And it should help him identify low-impact foods within budget
    And it should recognize "Choosing dried beans over beef reduces ecological impact"
    And it should show how budget constraint can align with ecological care
    And the system should connect personal shopping to planetary stewardship
    And Kenji should see grocery choices as ecological care work

  Scenario: Recognizing resource constraint as ecological practice
    Given Kenji's $180/week budget forces minimal consumption
    And ecological sustainability requires reduced consumption
    When the bioregional_elohim reframes Kenji's scarcity
    Then it should recognize that living on limited resources is low ecological impact
    And it should validate "Your minimal consumption is ecological stewardship"
    And it should show how his constrained lifestyle aligns with sustainability
    And resource constraint should be recognized as ecological care
    And the system should honor scarcity as ecological practice
    And Kenji should understand his poverty as inadvertently sustainable

  Scenario: Food waste reduction as ecological care work
    Given Kenji cannot afford to waste food
    And food waste has significant ecological cost
    When the bioregional_elohim tracks food waste reduction
    Then it should recognize Kenji's waste prevention as ecological care
    And it should accumulate care tokens for using all ingredients
    And it should value creative cooking with leftovers
    And it should show "Zero food waste this week = ecological contribution"
    And waste reduction should be recognized as care economy work
    And Kenji's efficient resource use should be valued ecologically

  Scenario: Understanding bioregional food systems
    Given Kenji's food comes from complex global supply chains
    And bioregional food systems are more sustainable
    When the bioregional_elohim educates about food sourcing
    Then it should show him where his food comes from
    And it should help him identify local and seasonal options within budget
    And it should teach him about bioregional food production
    And it should connect his shopping to support for local food systems
    And the system should build bioregional food literacy
    And Kenji should understand food through ecological and regional lens

  Scenario: Academic learning applied to daily ecological choices
    Given Kenji studies environmental science academically
    And he makes consumption decisions daily
    When the bioregional_elohim connects learning to practice
    Then it should help him apply academic knowledge to personal choices
    And it should show "Your understanding of nitrogen cycles informs food decisions"
    And it should bridge theory and practice
    And it should recognize his daily life as laboratory for ecological care
    And the system should integrate academic and practical ecological knowledge
    And Kenji should live his environmental science education

  Scenario: Ecological impact of household coordination
    Given Kenji lives with three roommates
    And household coordination can reduce ecological impact
    When the bioregional_elohim tracks household ecological practices
    Then it should recognize shared living as ecologically efficient
    And it should show how cooking for four is more efficient than four cooking separately
    And it should value household bulk buying as reducing packaging waste
    And it should accumulate care tokens for ecological household practices
    And the system should recognize household coordination as ecological care
    And shared living should be valued as sustainability practice

  Scenario: Transportation choices and ecological impact
    Given Kenji walks most places due to lack of car
    And walking has minimal ecological impact
    When the bioregional_elohim tracks transportation
    Then it should recognize walking as ecological care contribution
    And it should accumulate care tokens for low-impact transportation
    And it should show "Walking instead of driving prevented X carbon emissions"
    And it should validate that poverty can align with ecological values
    And the system should recognize low-impact mobility as care work
    And Kenji should see his car-free life as ecological stewardship

  Scenario: Connecting personal consumption to planetary boundaries
    Given Kenji's consumption choices aggregate with billions of others
    And planetary boundaries define sustainable resource use
    When the bioregional_elohim shows planetary context
    Then it should help Kenji understand his consumption in global context
    And it should show "Your consumption is well below sustainable average"
    And it should connect personal choices to planetary care economy
    And it should teach him that individual actions scale to collective impact
    And the system should bridge personal and planetary scales
    And Kenji should understand himself as participant in planetary care economy

  Scenario: Campus environmental advocacy as ecological care work
    Given Kenji's college has environmental impact and policies
    And students can advocate for institutional sustainability
    When Kenji participates in campus environmental organizing
    Then the bioregional_elohim should recognize advocacy as ecological care work
    And it should accumulate care tokens for environmental activism
    And it should value organizing for institutional change
    And it should recognize that systemic change requires collective action
    And the system should support student environmental advocacy
    And campus organizing should be understood as ecological care economy work

  Scenario: Learning bioregional ecological patterns
    Given Kenji lives in specific bioregion with unique ecology
    And bioregional awareness is core to ecological care
    When the bioregional_elohim teaches about local ecology
    Then it should help Kenji learn local watershed, species, and ecosystems
    And it should connect him to bioregional natural patterns
    And it should show seasonal changes and ecological cycles
    And it should build his sense of place in bioregional context
    And the system should foster bioregional ecological literacy
    And Kenji should understand himself as member of bioregional community

  Scenario: Future career aligned with ecological care economy
    Given Kenji studies environmental science for future career
    And he wants work that serves ecological flourishing
    When the bioregional_elohim supports career development
    Then it should help him identify care economy environmental careers
    And it should connect his learning to ecological stewardship work
    And it should validate environmental work as care economy contribution
    And it should support him developing career serving planetary flourishing
    And the system should recognize ecological professions as care work
    And Kenji's career should serve care economy at planetary scale

  Scenario: Distinguishing ecological care from greenwashing
    Given many products and institutions claim environmental responsibility falsely
    And Kenji needs to distinguish genuine ecological care from marketing
    When the bioregional_elohim helps Kenji evaluate environmental claims
    Then it should teach him to recognize greenwashing
    And it should help him identify genuinely sustainable practices
    And it should build critical ecological literacy
    And it should protect him from false environmental marketing
    And the system should teach sophisticated ecological analysis
    And Kenji should distinguish real care economy from extractive economy in green clothing

  Scenario: Ecological care as spiritual and ethical practice
    Given Kenji's environmental values are deeply held
    And ecological care connects to meaning and purpose
    When the bioregional_elohim supports Kenji's values
    Then it should recognize ecological stewardship as ethical practice
    And it should validate his care for planet as meaningful
    And it should connect ecological care to larger purpose
    And it should support integration of values across life domains
    And the system should honor ecological care as spiritual practice
    And Kenji should experience planetary care as part of life meaning

  Scenario: Student generation as agents of ecological transformation
    Given Kenji's generation will inherit climate crisis and ecological breakdown
    And students are developing patterns that will shape future
    When the bioregional_elohim recognizes generational context
    Then it should validate student ecological anxiety and grief
    And it should empower students as agents of ecological transformation
    And it should support collective action for systemic change
    And it should recognize that care economy is ecological imperative
    And the system should foster student leadership in ecological care
    And Kenji's generation should be empowered to build ecological care economy
